metadata.title: CVE-2019-11723 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability exists during the installation of add-ons where the initialfetch ignored the origin attributes of the browsing context. This couldleak cookies in private browsing mode or across different "containers" forpeople who use the Firefox Multi-Account Containers Web Extension. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 68.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
